dataset_id: LBA Regional Tree Cover from AVHRR, 1-km, 1992-1993 (DeFries et al.)
title: LBA Regional Tree Cover from AVHRR, 1-km, 1992-1993 (DeFries et al.)
summary: This data set is a subset of the 1-km global tree cover data set (DeFries et al. 1999) developed at the Laboratory for Global Remote Sensing Studies (LGRSS) at the University of Maryland. The subset was created for the study area of the Large Scale Biosphere-Atmosphere Experiment in Amazonia (LBA) in South America. The data are in ASCII GRID format.
